# Data Description





```{r chunck_6, echo=TRUE, tidy=TRUE}
#dummy comment
install.packages("dplyr")
library(dplyr)

smmr = summarize(col, 
                 avg = mean(col),
                 min = min(col), 
                 max = max(col), 
                 med = median(col)) %>%
    apply(data, .)
```
